name: ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC
description: Big data analytics examines millions, if not billions of records, to unmask hidden patterns, provide actionable insights and interpretable results for various domains.

name: WHEEL ALIGNMENT
description: The present study uses a large group decision-making technique to identify and rank the best big data-driven circular economy (BDDCE) practices in the auto-component industry.

name: OIL CHANGING
description: The disruptive innovative technologies facilitate organizational performance through solutions that restrict scarce resource consumption and discover sustainable materials.

name: BRAKE REPARING
description: This study aims to identify the Big Data-Driven Circular Economy (BDDCE) practices that are significant for successfully implementing the CE business models in manufacturing organizations.

name: WASH AND GLASSING
description: The research methodology comprising the participants' details, the BDDCE practices, and the LGDM technique is described in Section 3. In Section 4, we present the analysis and findings.

name: COMPLETE ANALYSIS
description: Firms' networking with customers and suppliers (Gupta et al., 2019), along with precise information throughout a product's lifecycle (Jabbour et al., 2019), is required to successfully implement CE principles.
